程序包 application.controller

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Check
    This class is used to check cookies/ghost/gate.. when Pacman move.
    Controller  
    Draw
    This class is used to draw the board of the game with the cookies, ghost, lives and the pacman.
    GameManager
    This class is to manage the whole game.
    Main
    Show the start page.
    MovePac
    This class is use to move or stop the pacman by monitoring the player's key event.
    ScoreBoardController
    This is the controller of the ScoreBoard page.
    ScoreList
    This class is used to generate the permanent high score list.
    SetUpController
    This is the controller of the SetUp page.
    StartPageController
    This is the controller of StartPage.
